title: Strengthening Clinical Practical Competencies: Data-Driven High-Energy-Density Hydrocarbon Fuel Design Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic chemistry knowledge and foundational data analysis concepts
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more high-energy molecular structure patterns based on ZINC20 database analysis results.
Learners can construct fuel performance prediction models using group contribution methods and DFT calculation results.
Learners can analyze the practicality of ZD-6 and similar molecules by applying a neural network-based synthetic complexity evaluation system.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
